name: search for the DARK BALL
description:
a robot been sent  from scientists because they heard there is a thing called the dark ball. it grants you the power to shape the earth and sea (kinda like a sandbox). but while your being programmed they put a code line that made the  robot will have a brain. and you (the player/robot) noticed those are not scientists and sent you to get it so they can have for themselves so they sent you the place and didn't know the you know their plan. and the story continues when you play.

chapter: the beginning
